title: Add filtering capability to MoreLikeThisComponent
description: MoreLikeThisHandler supports the fq parameter, but MoreLikeThisComponent does not allow filtering. I would like to add an mlt.fq param so we can pass filters to the component.

comments.author: Cat Bieber
comments.content: Initial patch. I didn't see any tests for MoreLikeThisComponent and haven't added any yet. Also, still considering whether I need to add to debug output so the filters are reported there. Advice welcome.
